entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
